```{r}
a <- c("1","b","TRUE")
a
a[[2]] <- "c" # 元素存在: 替換
a[[4]] <- "7" # 元素不存在： 增加
a[c(5,6)] <- c("J", "K")
```


```{r}
a[[7]] = "Johnson"
a
a= c(a,"...")
a
# recursion google trick
```

# fithur replacement

```{r}
library(lubridate)
list1 <- 
  list(
    list(
      name="Jack",
      birthday=ymd("1998-03-21"),
      status=c(height=177, weight=80)
    )
  )


```


```{r}
# 更改日期
list1[[1]]$birthday <- ymd("1997-03-21")

# 新增資料
list1[[2]] <- list(
  name="Mary",
  birthday=ymd("1998-08-24")
)

```

```{r}
 status=c(height=163, weight=45)
list1[[2]][[3]] = status

list1[[1]][[3]][[1]]=177

str(list1)
```

```{r}
list1[[2]]$status <- c(height=163, weight=45)
list1[[1]]$status[["height"]] <- 176
str(list1)
```
